message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm afraid I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I can offer it to you for $135.
I appreciate the willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $125?
I'm glad we're close, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I get a fair price. I can offer it to you for $130.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $127?
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I can offer it to you for $132. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
